text: Na y’amezi matagatifu arangiye, nimwice b’abagereranyi b’Imana n’ibindi bintu aho muzohurira hose, kandi mubagire imbohe, kandi mubakikuze nukubicarira mumayira yose, mugabo nibasaba ikigongwe nuguhagarika amasengesho hamwe nugutanga imperezwa muce mubarekera inzira yabo, mu vy’ukuri Imana niyo ifise ikigongwe cinshi hamwe n’impuhwe zihagije
